column5: Is it possible to post pictures and video to OFC via iPhone or Android ?  Thanks  Randy
I can't I have to switch to "View Desktop Version" on my phone to post photos

I do... It's easy...  I use the photobucket app..  You upload your pic to photobicket.... Then copy the IMG code... Then past it in your post...  I find it easier to post with my phone instead of camera to computer to photobucket to OFC.....
yes i do it all the time just upload to photobucket then post from your phone...
Lets see how photobucket app works  Seems pretty good. If. This works
